title: 1032 - Ray's Holiday Trip With Scooter
description:
A holiday theme park tour with Ray and Scoots where every puddle offers a chance to pause and meander.

Support our AAPI community -take action right now www.napawf.org/take-action

Black Lives Matter. When I say “you deserve a good night’s sleep” it means black lives matter. More resources here- https://linktr.ee/dearestscooter. Here is a list of Anti-racism resources- http://bit.ly/ANTIRACISMRESOURCES

Here is one place you can find support during this or any crisis. If you have more please share them! https://www.crisistextline.org/ There are more global helplines here https://linktr.ee/creatorselfcare

Get your Sleep With Me SLEEPPHONES at https://sleepwithmepodcast.com/sleepphones use “sleepwithme” for $5 off!!!

Become a patron https://www.patreon.com/sleepwithme
Join our referral program www.sleepwithmepodcast.com/refer
Get your name on the sleepy support zone www.sleepwithmepodcast.com/sponsors

Commission a song from the Mystery Bard over at http://www.jonathanmann.net

Overland- uses expert craftsmanship to pair the highest-quality Merino sheepskin—which is naturally moisture-wicking, temperature-regulating, and anti-microbial—with supportive memory foam midsoles, in order to make slippers that feel better and wear better, for longer. Get the best slippers on the market at overland.com/sleep You’ll get free shipping and free returns!

Endel- is a wellness app that helps you focus, relax, and sleep better through the power of sound. The Sleep soundscape is designed to help children and adults sleep and nap better. Use the code ‘SleepWithMe’ to start your free 1-month subscription to Endel at code.endel.io

Shopify- the all-in-one commerce platform to start, run, and grow your business. Shopify is more than a store. Connect with your customers. Drive sales. Manage your day-to-day. Shopify instantly lets you accept all major payment methods. Go to shopify.com/sleep, ALL LOWERCASE, for a FREE 14 day trial and get full access to Shopify’s entire suite of features.

Allform - the easiest way you can customize a sofa using premium materials, and at a fraction of the cost of traditional stores. Allform is offering 20% off all orders for our listeners at allform.com/sleep.

Headspace- Go to https://www.headspace.com/sleepwithme and use sleepwithme for a FREE one month trial!!

Betterhelp- Betterhelp offers licensed professional counselors, it’s a truly affordable option and our listeners get 10% off your first month with discount code “sleepwithme”. Go over to www.betterhelp.com/sleepwithme and simply fill out a questionnaire to help assess your needs and get matched with a counselor you’ll love.

Helix Sleep- Just go to helixsleep.com/sleep, take their two-minute sleep quiz, and they’ll match you to a customized mattress that will give you the best sleep of your life.

Apollo Neuro- is a new wearable that improves your body’s resilience to stress and works by engaging with your sense of touch, helping you feel safe and in control of your stress levels. Try Apollo Neuro today and get 10% off your purchase at apolloneuro.com/sleepwithme.
